name: hendamm-exec-pipeline-task
description: Extension to exec pipeline in azure devops
helpMarkDown: Extension to exec pipeline in azure devops
author: HenDa Chapter DevSecOps

inputs.name: azureDevopsPath
inputs.label: Azure Devops Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the service connection for azure devops (if you want to use it).

inputs.name: branch
inputs.label: Branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: The branch to execute the pipeline.

inputs.name: pipelineID
inputs.label: Pipeline ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ID of the pipeline to execute (you can find it in the URL).

inputs.name: reason
inputs.label: Reason for execution
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the reason for the execution.

inputs.name: isParameter
inputs.label: Extra Data is Parameter
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked, the extra data will be passed as parameters to the pipeline instead of variables.

inputs.name: parameters
inputs.label: Parameters or Variables to pass to the pipeline (JSON)
inputs.helpMarkDown: If you want to pass parameters or variables to the pipeline, you can use this field. The format is JSON (e.g. {"key": "value"}).

inputs.name: onlyExecution
inputs.label: Just execute the pipeline
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked, the pipeline will be executed without waiting for the result.
